评论详情: These pants are very soft and comfortable, but too thin. They accentuate every bump and curve on my body. Just not for me. Sending them back.

Best work from home pants ever! They are so comfortable, but also nice enough to run errands if I need to. Makes me feel like I at least got dressed, and I was so tired of wearing leggings every single day.
Suaves, comodos y perfecta talla.

The pants were very nice….quality, color, material…..and the price was great! It took too long to receive them, and that was disappointing!!  The other disappointing factor is that they did not come in petite length (shorter). I knew this when I ordered them, but thought perhaps they might still work……but when I tried them on, they were about 4 inches too long, and not being a good enough seamstress, I was not able to alter them.  I can’t blame the vendor for this, because I knew they were not petite length when I ordered them……so, my review is probably a suggestion; it would be great to offer this bargain for us “shorties”…..these bargains never seem to come in petite length.  One bright side is that I was able to “gift” them to the mother of a friend who is taller than I…..she loves them!!

These are so soft and fit so beautifully I wish I had more!! I am 215 lbs and 5'6 and I got a large. I will be buying these again in the same size but the pack of black ones so I can wear them all the time!!

Getting these in all colors. Perfect fit 👌

I bought these pants because I needed something stretchy and with a wide enough leg to slide over a cast. I had no idea what to expect, but this was going to be delivered quickly so worth a try. The pants are very stretchy and I have no trouble getting them over my cast. I put on the light/tan colored pair after they were delivered; I wouldn’t wear these out of the house because the fabric is so thin you see everything. Even the pockets on the front, which are nice to have, are very visible as you wear the pants, at least for me. This problem may not be as severe with the darker colors.Also, there is a very narrow band of elastic at the top of the high waist. It’s just tight enough on me that if I left it where it normally falls, it might become uncomfortable after a while because it’s so narrow. But since I’ll be wearing them at home and don’t care what the waist looks like, I folded the elastic down and it didn’t bother me. Overall, pretty comfy and very economical, given my specific needs right now. If I hadn’t had this cast, I would probably return them or just wear them at home.

Perfect fit true to size. Light weight and perfect for travel especially in hot temperatures. Love the fabric so soft and wrinkle resistant. Pockets are nice and deep. Looking forward to wearing these on my trip to India.

These pants feel great. They are light weight but are prone to static. These are LEISURE pants and cut like a fabulous work pant. If this company makes this cut in a thicker fabric, I would buy every color! That being said, heads up, I am 4’11” and 140ish (a little thick for my height). These pants at a large size has an inseam of 31” and I need a 28-29. I believe this cut would be ideal for individuals 5’1”-5’-8” and not petite individuals under 5’. Fortunately, (like every short person I know) I have a seamstress that will alleviate this issue. Good purchase knowing that this is a super thin material that cannot be worn publicly.

评论概述: LOVE LOVE LOVE - BEST travel/casual pants EVER!
评论详情: Oh my goodness—I want these in every single color! I bought a 3-pack and love them so much. They have pockets, have a nice flow and fit, and a nice feel on my stomach and back when wearing them. These pants travel well when rolled into a bag (minimal wrinkles upon arrival) and also were wonderful to wear on a VERY LONG DAY of airplane and road travel (over 24 hours). I recommend them to anyone who asks for comfy, slightly fancy everyday pants.  Could dress up or down depending on the need. The price point was fantastic at less than $11/pair.  Try them out and I hope you like them as much as I do!
